title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: damassé (5-harness satin plus 1/4 twill)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 48 x 75.3 cm (18 7/8 x 29 5/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen
description: Yellow damassé showing the Pope's crown and crossed keys, Bishops' mitres and staves, and a Cardinal's hat with two tassels enclosed in a cartouche.
